医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究显示新医生第一年性骚扰普遍存在一项新的研究发现，超过一半的新医生在入职第一年面临某种形式的性骚扰，其中包括近四分之三的新女医生和三分之一的男医生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Sexual-harassment-prevalent-among-new-doctors-in-their-first-year-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Sexual-harassment-prevalent-among-new-doctors-in-their-first-year-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2788e666-8741-4a19-a8da-baf595983d15 Fri, 22 Mar 2024 22:16:20 -0400 Sexual harassment prevalent among new doctors in their first year, study reveals
新药物抑制剂靶向与阿尔茨海默病和心脏病相关的蛋白质科罗拉多大学安舒茨医学院的科学家表示，一种在阿尔茨海默病和心脏病的发展中起重要作用的复杂蛋白质对健康的影响可以通过三种药物抑制剂来减轻。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/New-drug-inhibitors-target- Protein-linked-to-Alzheimers-and-heart-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/New-drug-inhibitors-target- Protein-linked-to-Alzheimers-and-heart-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f725c12-e385-4e90-bf72-0dabfe709d4e Fri, 22 Mar 2024 22:12:28 -0400 New drug inhibitors target protein linked to Alzheimer's and heart disease
研究为家族性 ALS 的可能原因提供了第一个证据肌萎缩侧索硬化症（ALS）是一种退行性疾病。负责运动的神经元开始死亡，肌肉控制逐渐丧失，导致致命的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Research-provides-first-evidence-for-a-possible-cause-of-familial-ALS.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Research-provides-first-evidence-for-a-possible-cause-of-familial-ALS.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f7cbf9e-e332-4c76-a50b-fc75604b743f Fri, 22 Mar 2024 22:06:33 -0400 Research provides first evidence for a possible cause of familial ALS
西奈山启动首项高分辨率脑机接口研究来自西奈山伊坎医学院的神经外科医生和神经科学家组成的多学科团队是纽约第一个研究新型脑机接口的团队，该接口旨在以数百个分辨率实时绘制大脑表面的大面积地图。比神经外科手术中使用的典型阵列详细倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Mount-Sinai-launches-first-study-on-high-resolution-brain-computer-interface.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Mount-Sinai-launches-first-study-on-high-resolution-brain-computer-interface.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0ecb1538-cbae-436b-b0a5-3eea8e5c4480 Fri, 22 Mar 2024 22:01:19 -0400 Mount Sinai launches first study on high-resolution brain-computer interface
研究表明 ALS 和 FTLD 的细胞、分子重叠从表面上看，运动障碍性肌萎缩侧索硬化症（ALS）（也称为卢伽雷氏病）和认知障碍额颞叶变性（FTLD）（额颞叶痴呆的基础）的表现方式截然不同。此外，已知它们主要影响大脑的不同区域。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Study-shows-cellular-molecular-overlaps-in-ALS-and-FTLD.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Study-shows-cellular-molecular-overlaps-in-ALS-and-FTLD.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e253479f-0f4a-46cd-9472-64b98114d0fe Fri, 22 Mar 2024 21:57:17 -0400 Study shows cellular, molecular overlaps in ALS and FTLD
肺部疾病患者更容易患心脏病，不受任何危险因素的影响最新研究表明，患有肺病的患者更有可能患上心脏病，而不受任何危险因素的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Lung-disease-病人-more-likely-to-develop-heart-disease-independent-of-any-risk-factors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Lung-disease-病人-more-likely-to-develop-heart-disease-independent-of-any-risk-factors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=51202d19-12f0-4dac-9b9b-23c0a7d90b20 Fri, 22 Mar 2024 21:50:27 -0400 Lung disease patients more likely to develop heart disease independent of any risk factors
推出用于简化生物医学数据管理的新统计工具生物统计部门是德国 Trias i Pujol 研究所 (IGTP) 最近新增的技术和服务，由统计学家和数学家团队组成，负责开展和支持生物医学研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/New-statistical-tools-for-streamlined-biomedical-data-management-introduced.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/New-statistical-tools-for-streamlined-biomedical-data-management-introduced.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e0901436-a3ec-460e-960e-1270263b31a7 Fri, 22 Mar 2024 21:40:17 -0400 New statistical tools for streamlining biomedical data management introduced
通过多尾结构提高 mRNA 活性和寿命信使 RNA (mRNA) 因其在多种 COVID-19 疫苗中的基石作用，在大流行期间一跃成为公众关注的焦点https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Boosting-mRNA-activity-and-longevity-with-multi-tailed-structs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Boosting-mRNA-activity-and-longevity-with-multi-tailed-structs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1ff1f461-dfb7-46fa-bfe2-7a9cfd3f9502 Fri, 22 Mar 2024 21:33:11 -0400 Boosting mRNA activity and longevity with multi-tailed structures
绘制衰老大脑的蛋白质图谱慕尼黑大学和 SyNergy 卓越集群的研究人员分析了特定脑细胞的蛋白质组如何随着年龄的增长而变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Mapping-the-aging-brains- Protein-landscape.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Mapping-the-aging-brains- Protein-landscape.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3ba20203-c365-4d24-a113-828fbd61fb8e Fri, 22 Mar 2024 21:28:00 -0400 Mapping the aging brain's protein landscape
彻底改变富含半胱氨酸的肽生产以促进药物发现使用有助于模仿自然方式的反应溶剂可以更有效、更快速地制备用于药物发现研究的某些类型的肽和微生物蛋白。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Revolutionizing-cysteine-rich-peptide-production-for-drug-discovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Revolutionizing-cysteine-rich-peptide-production-for-drug-discovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b880e9b7-32a2-4900-bacd-18c6a8d2c00b Fri, 22 Mar 2024 21:23:50 -0400 Revolutionizing cysteine-rich peptide production for drug discovery
